text: I have been trying to return an expensive top for 10 days and no one has responded to my multiple requests for a shipping label and finalized RA number.

author: customer
text: Good selection of items, but size descriptions are sometimes inconsistent for the same brand. Shipping should be free both ways, most luxury clothing brands offer that to customers now.
title: Good selection of items

author: Valérie B
text: I ordered a size 9 women Dr. Martens and end up with a size 9 men. ( size 10 women ) No details about the size on my bill and I had to pay an extra 30$ to UPS. That's quite expensive for boots i will never wear because if i return them now I will lose 100$ on total shipping... Very desappointing.
title: I ordered a size 9 women Dr

author: customer Jennifer
text: Delivery prices are ridiculous and the items pictures and prescriptions are terrible
title: Delivery prices are ridiculous and the…All

author: Banu
text: The website itself is easy to use but the purse I purchased was not good quality, the leather was cracked which was not in the photo or description
title: The website itself is easy to use but…

author: customer
text: Customer service is extremely slow.  I had several questions about the authenticity of my purchase and sent an email to customer service. I did not receive a reply until 6 days later.  I then responded and another 6 days have gone by and I still haven't received a reply or resolution to my issue.  It would also be helpful if I at least received a automated generated confirmation email after my first inquiry, since I had no idea if my email was received.
title: Customer service is extremely slow

author: customer
text: I was sent the wrong item
title: I was sent the wrong item

author: customer
text: The worst I had a bad experience buying a purse it was so dirty it doesn’t look nothing like the picture and they don’t explain that to you how bad they look
title: The worst I had a bad experience buying…

author: customer
text: I wish I could give two separate reviews.  I loved working with my consignor and would give her 5 stars!  However, I am extremely disappointed with the overall sales customer service.  The same day I purchased my Chanel bag, I received an alert (an hour later) from a competitor for the same bag in better condition and over $1,000 less!!!! I've asked customer service if something can be done, can they price match the item or something! The agent I was live chatting with wasn't understanding what I was trying to convey and basically said there is nothing they can do.
title: I wish I could give two separate…

author: Lori Klein
text:
First purchase from TRR and it was shoes in the only size I ever wear. (10). They run small and can’t be returned. Apparently they were final sale. 

Probably won’t be taking risks in the future. Disappointed.
title: First purchase from TRR and it was…disappointing

author: customer
text: I have called numerous times about the same issue-no one calls back
title: follow up is awful

author: Dina
text: Have a larger window for returning bags. Stop charging shipping so much for shipping
title: Have a larger window for returning…

author: Fea
text: Very disappointed with my purchase. Won’t be able to wear the boots, they have stains everywhere. They sold the item as excellent condition and it’s final sale.
title: Very disappointed with my purchase

author: Marci Monaco-Pasquito
text: I have made many purchases from TRR…usually good.  Last purchase made I received the wrong item (blatant mistake) and spent hours chatting via text as to returning and receiving the correct order.  6 days later I still don’t know if I’ll be getting my original order.  A rep does not have the authority to “speak” on the phone…only chat via text.
title: I have made many purchases from…Last purchase wrong

author: NoumenalGirl
text:
The item I ordered was correct, and arrived on time.

However, it was dirty. 

As someone who shops vintage quite often on other sites like Poshmark, Grailed, etc this is the first time I had the garment arrive unlaundered. 

 Visible gross stains on it. 

Needless to say, I am not impressed.
title: Passable. Experience could have been better.

author: customer
text: Many issues. Incorrect pricing/ item description. At store poor customer service. Long wait for customer service response. Lack  of communication.
title: Many issues

text: what i ordered was broken

author: Andrea Alexander
text: Dirty clothes that I had to wash. Very disappointed since it was my first experience. However, everyone deserves a reprieve. Thank you.

text: Fake nasty purse. Terrible. I will be reporting
